## Question 1

```{r}
library(readr)
library(here)
courses <- read_csv(here("courses.csv"))
```

## Question 2


```{r message=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(knitr)

courses |> 
  rename(
    course_name = course,
    identifier = course_id,
    number_of_exams = nb_grades
  ) |> 
  arrange(course_name) |> 
  kable()
```
